START:
Welcome to Anonymous Chat

/find to find a chat partner
/next to stop chatting and find another partner
/stop to stop chatting
/exit to stop searching for a chat partner

/ping to check bot status
/users to see current active users

/contribute to contribute to the project/report bugs
HELP:
/find to find a chat partner
/next to stop chatting and find another partner
/stop to stop chatting
/exit to stop searching for a chat partner

/contribute to contribute to the project/report bugs
CONTRIBUTE:
If you want to contribute to the bot

such as:
- adding features
- reporting bugs
- etc

you can pull request or create an issue on GitHub

FIND.WARNING_1: You are already in the Queue
FIND.WARNING_2: You are already in a chat

NEXT.SUCCESS_2: Your partner has ended the conversation
NEXT.WARNING_1:
You don't have a chat partner

/find to search for a chat partner

STOP.SUCCESS_2: Your partner has ended the conversation
STOP.WARNING_1:
You don't have a chat partner

/find to search for a chat partner

EXIT.SUCCESS_1: Searching for a chat partner has been stopped
EXIT.WARNING_1: You are not in the queue

CONNECT.WARNING_1:
You don't have a chat partner

/find to search for a chat partner
